profiledesc.descrules: Finding aid based on DACS (Describing Archives: A Content Standard)

repository.corpname: Oregon Historical Society, Davies Family Research Library

address.addressline: Oregon Historical Society Davies Family Research Library

did.abstract: Collection includes: Confirmation certificate, 1875; Release from Prussian citizenship papers, 1889; Letters of introduction and other correspondence, 1891-1918, regarding his career as a Lutheran clergyman in the United States. August Johann Heinrich Krause (1861-1941) was a German immigrant and pastor at St. Paul's Evangelical Luthern Church in Portland, Oregon, 1893-1928.

langmaterial.language: Most items in this collection are in German. English translations are included.

bioghist.p: August Johann Heinrich Krause (1861-1941) was a German immigrant and pastor at St. Paul's Evangelical Luthern Church in Portland, Oregon, 1893-1928.

scopecontent.p: Collection includes: Confirmation certificate, 1875; Release from Prussian citizenship papers, 1889; Letters of introduction and other correspondence, 1891-1918, regarding his career as a Lutheran clergyman in the United States.

acqinfo.p: Gift of Vernon E. Ross, September 1976.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open to the public.

userestrict.p: The Oregon Historical Society is the owner of the materials in the Research Library and makes available reproductions for research, publication, and other uses. Written permission must be obtained from the Research Library prior to any use of reproductions. The Society does not necessarily hold copyright to all the materials in the collections. In some cases, permission for use of reproductions may require seeking additional authorization from the copyright holders.

prefercite.p: August Krause Papers, Mss 2575, Oregon Historical Society Research Library.

controlaccess.corpname: St. Paul's Evangelical Lutheran Church (Portland, Or.)
